column4: well i don't know what i did to screw up my web flash player as it was working until recently. anyone give me an idea of what to look for or where to start?
could try sudo apt-get --purge remove flashplugin-nonfree && sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree
(that reinstalls the flash plugin, by the way; the && does the second command after the first, providing the first one is successful)
the purge was successful yet i still don't have any flash.... anyone with more ideas?
